info.name: Serverfault
info.description: A slight restyle of Server Fault. Makes things a little curvey, links are more obcious. Colours changed to pleasing (to my eyes) greys etc.
info.additionalInfo:
If you wanted to change the colours of Server Fault and make links stand out then this makes it quite easy.

Aug 2012 - Tweaked to change the gopping yellow colour of vote count on accepted meta answers.

May 2014 - Removed the visual difference between code and block quotes as Anna has fixed them on the site.
